name: Rex, Freight Fur Hire
effectText: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 Spell/Trap "Fur Hire" from your Deck to your hand. During the Main Phase, if you control a monster "Fur Hire" (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 card "Fur Hire" in your GY; either add it to your hand, or Special Summon it if it was a monster. You can only use each effect of "Rex, Freight Fur Hire" once per turn.
